info.title: AHEM - Ad Hoc Email
info.description:
Welcome to the AHEM API documentation.
AHEM provides an easy to use RESTful API that allows testing or building anything on top of the AHEM mail server.
All endpoints follow the URL:
https://www.ahem.email/api/

__Authorization__
A token must be obtained by calling https://www.ahem.email/auth/authenticate.
The response will contain a token field. Tokens must be added to each api call in the Authorization header and a Bearer token, unless the server is set with token expiration == -1.
